Articles.Content: So I\'m wondering what other sort of stuff will show up in the KSP store and when. I think a good place to start would be a couple shirt designs and posters. Maybe a little plastic statue of a Kerbalnaut. I would be a great way to get some extra 'donations' with the profit and a way to advertise for the game. I personally would love to have a shirt.

Lego maybe?

I would buy it. And then I would insert fireworks into the rocket parts so I could launch them.

I should do a staged version to look like a kerbin one. Toughest part will be doing the simulated fuel tanks, but I probably can print them off. I could do staged one too. Wonder if I have the stuff around to do that.

If by taking matters in your hands you mean getting the License from Squad to make KSP shirts to sell, then I say go for it. If you mean by not getting Squad\'s okay, then I would have to kindly ask you to get your brain checked out to find out what is the matter with you, as that would not only potentially hurt Squad, but also get you into deep legal hot water.

If you mean by not getting Squad\'s okay, then I would have to kindly ask you to get your brain checked out to find out what is the matter with you, as that would not only potentially hurt Squad, but also get you into deep legal hot water.

Why do I always forget these things :v

Trust me when I tell you, Squad wants to get some merchandise up for sale as much as we want to buy it. There are a number of issues that need to be resolved and dealt with before this can happen and that\'s what is holding things up right now from what I can tell.

T-shirts are a given, we know they will be able to offer them up easy enough. What would really fly off the shelves are figurines and plushies. I\'m sure once Dan has done a bunch of animations setting the appearance of a Kerbal more in stone, it will be easier for Squad to start looking at having them manufactured.

For now, all we can do is dream up ideas.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
